Volker Bergmann (dipl. phys.) is freelancing IT Consultant for software architecture and design.
His focus is the design, analysis and optimization of Java Enterprise Applications with particular design and performance requirements. The platforms of choice are Weblogic and JBoss and he is JBoss Certified Consultant.
He promoted major projects (Deutsche Telekom, Postbank, Interhyp, Payback, O2) and now utilizes his expertise in software design and architecture for the development of methods and tools for the improvement of software quality and performance.
Currently he is working on databene benerator, an open source tool for the generation of load test data.
For more information about Volker Bergmann, see his web site: http://www.bergmann-it.de
